attributes.action: Save the Old Barn, Tarling Road N2
attributes.additional_details:
For two years residents living in East Finchley Barnet have been calling on Barnet Council to resolve an on-going dispute over the rightful management of the Old Barn Community Centre, Tarling Road N2.

Our petition calls upon the Government to speak to Barnet Council, to encourage them to act now and restore this important local facility back to the local community, to be run in accordance with the existing lease and governing documents by local people for the benefit of local people.
